RC 669 32-bits Space-coded with header
--------------------------------------
Header pulse = 9000usec
Header space = 4500usec
Pulse = 600usec
0 Space = 530usec
1 Space = 1600usec
Has trailing pulse after last bit
Always has 16 0-bits and 16 1-bits because
 the second byte is the complement of the first byte and
 the fourth byte is the complement of the third byte
--------------------------------------
	 38H=56   C7H=199
R6C2	00011100 11100011 00000000 11111111	0	0
R3C1	00011100 11100011 10000000 01111111	1	1
R3C2	00011100 11100011 01000000 10111111	2	2
R3C3	00011100 11100011 11000000 00111111	3	3
R4C1	00011100 11100011 00100000 11011111	4	4
R4C2	00011100 11100011 10100000 01011111	5	5
R4C3	00011100 11100011 01100000 10011111	6	6
R5C1	00011100 11100011 11100000 00011111	7	7
R5C2	00011100 11100011 00010000 11101111	8	8
R5C3	00011100 11100011 10010000 01101111	9	9
R6C1	00011100 11100011 01010000 10101111	10	1-
R6C3	00011100 11100011 11010000 00101111	11	2-
R5C4	00011100 11100011 00110000 11001111	12	Up
R6C4	00011100 11100011 10110000 01001111	13	Down
R10C2	00011100 11100011 01110000 10001111	14	Contrast up
R10C1	00011100 11100011 11110000 00001111	15	Contrast down
R10C3	00011100 11100011 10001000 01110111	17
R7C4	00011100 11100011 01001000 10110111	18	+
R7C3	00011100 11100011 11001000 00110111	19	-
R8C4	00011100 11100011 00101000 11010111	20	TV/Video
R8C3	00011100 11100011 10101000 01010111	21	Mute
R7C2	00011100 11100011 01101000 10010111	22	Volume up
R7C1	00011100 11100011 11101000 00010111	23	Volume down
R9C4	00011100 11100011 00011000 11100111	24
R9C3	00011100 11100011 10011000 01100111	25
R8C2	00011100 11100011 01011000 10100111	26
R8C1	00011100 11100011 11011000 00100111	27
R10C4	00011100 11100011 00111000 11000111	28	Power
R3C4	00011100 11100011 10111000 01000111	29	Alt
R9C2	00011100 11100011 01111000 10000111	30	Brightness up
R9C1	00011100 11100011 11111000 00000111	31	Brightness down
R1C4	00011100 11100011 01100010 10011101	70
R1C1	00011100 11100011 10110010 01001101	77
R2C1	00011100 11100011 01110010 10001101	78
R1C3	00011100 11100011 11110010 00001101	79
R2C2	00011100 11100011 00001010 11110101	80
R2C4	00011100 11100011 10001010 01110101	81
R2C3	00011100 11100011 10101010 01010101	85
R1C2	00011100 11100011 01101010 10010111	86
-------------------------
Repeat code
Header pulse = 8800usec
Header space = 2350usec
Repeat pulse = 600usec
Sent every 100msec


IR switches on remote for Sony Video Camera
-------------------------------------------
Pulse coded with header
12 or 15 bits
-------------------------------------------
T		010 110 010 011 011
Start/Stop	100 110 010 011 101
W		110 110 010 011 011
Ff		000 110 011 100
Stop		001 110 011 100
Play		010 110 011 100
Display		010 110 111 100
Pause		100 110 011 100
Slow		110 001 011 100
Rew		110 110 011 100


IR for the Mitsubishi
---------------------------
No header
---------------------------
Power	0001 0101 1011 1111
Eject	0001 0101 1001 0011
ProgRec	0001 0101 0000 0111
One	0001 0101 1111 1111
Two	0001 0101 1110 1111
Play	0001 0101 1101 1111
